Buying smart thermostats.

Why Wi-Fi thermostats are a great choice.

Whether or not you have a full smart home system, you can always make your house or apartment a little smarter and more eco-friendly by installing a Wi-Fi thermostat. This helpful tech can control temperature and humidity levels with the greatest energy efficiency.

Many digital thermostats allow you to program temperature changes in advance, but the best smart thermostat options also learn from your schedule. The technology can recognize patterns in your programming and maintain optimal temperatures without you having to input target temps every week.

Even better, you can adjust your home’s temperature from anywhere because your programmable thermostat connects to your home Wi-Fi network. If you’re out for longer than your thought, you can adjust the temperature in your home and program it to return to a comfortable temperature by the time you get back.

Getting the most out of your smart thermostat.

A smart thermostat can save you money on your energy bill, but only if you know what to look for when buying a smart thermostat and how to use it properly.

If you have a smart home display or voice assistant, you will want to choose a Wi-Fi thermostat that is compatible with your system so that you can send voice commands to adjust the temperature. For seamless smart home use, you can also choose a digital thermostat with a built-in voice assistant.

If you’re concerned about power outages, you will want a smart thermostat with backup battery power. And if you want notifications about changes in temperature or humidity, look at smart thermostats with alarm capabilities.

An energy-efficient smart thermostat can help you save on utility bills and do your part for sustainable living at the same time. Best of all, you can find other smart home devices that make as big a difference in your carbon footprint as the smart thermostat.
